hero.title: Professional Audit Management on the Blockchain

features.title: Comprehensive Audit Features

organizations.title: Organization Management
organizations.description: Create and manage organizations with hierarchical structures and XBRL taxonomy support for financial reporting

entities.title: Entity Management
entities.description: Track entities with customizable taxonomies including EAS, GCC, IFRS, and custom configurations

engagements.title: Engagement Tracking
engagements.description: Manage audit engagements with flexible linking to clients, entities, or organizations

dataImport.title: Intelligent Data Import
dataImport.description: Import Excel files with automatic type detection, PII identification, and data profiling

workingPapers.title: Automated Working Papers
workingPapers.description: Generate leadsheets, financial ratios, trend analysis, and variance reports automatically

security.title: Enterprise Security
security.description: Built on Internet Computer blockchain with role-based access control and audit trails

benefits.title: Why Choose AuditorBox
benefits.subtitle: Modern technology meets professional audit practices

automation.title: Intelligent Automation
automation.description: Reduce manual work with automated working paper generation, data validation, and analytical procedures

blockchain.title: Blockchain Security
blockchain.description: Immutable audit trail and tamper-proof document storage powered by Internet Computer

bilingual.title: Bilingual Support
bilingual.description: Full English and Arabic interface to serve diverse audit teams across the region

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Audit Practice?
cta.subtitle: Join leading audit firms using AuditorBox to deliver faster, more accurate engagements

activityLog.title: Activity Log
activityLog.blockchainInfo: All activity logs are cryptographically signed and chained on the Internet Computer, ensuring tamper-proof audit trails.
activityLog.revertConfirm: Revert resource to activity entry {{id}}? This will overwrite the current state.
activityLog.revertFailure: Failed to revert resource. Check permissions and try again.
activityLog.revertUnavailable: This entry does not contain a restorable snapshot.

clientAcceptance.info: Complete client acceptance procedures before starting any engagement. Partner approval is required for high-risk clients.

conflictCheck.info: Perform conflict checks before accepting new clients or engagements. All conflicts must be cleared before proceeding with the engagement.

conflictCheck.selectPrompt: Select a client to view conflict checks.
